    • Method Detail

      • getURI

        public static URI getURI(String base,
         String href)
        Build URI starting from the given base and href.

        If href is absolute or base is null then base will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        base - URI prefix.
        href - URI suffix.
        Returns:
        built URI.
